episodesJson.title: Back Soon
episodesJson.description: This week, we watched the 2007 Rob Williams (not to be confused with Robin Williams) movie Back Soon. When a straight drug dealer gets a horny dead lady's ghost inside his body, he turns gay for her widower, who turns gay for him too through the power of sleepwalking. It's a very confusing plot, but it's also very boring.
topics: The difference between Ding Dongs, HoHos and Cupcakes (hint, there isn't one)
